駽駽駽

駽字的基本解释

駽
xuān
青黑色的马。亦称“铁青马”。

駽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuān］
［《廣韻》火玄切，平先，曉。］
［《廣韻》許縣切，去霰，曉。］
亦作“駨2”。
青黑色的马。俗称铁青马。

駽字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駽； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1439第24
【唐韻】【集韻】火元切【韻會】呼元切【正韻】呼淵切，?音鋗。【爾雅·釋畜】靑驪，駽。【註】今鐵驄。【詩·魯頌】駜彼乗駽。　又【廣韻】許縣切【集韻】翾縣切【韻會】呼縣切【正韻】翾縣切，?音絢。又【集韻】熒絹切，音縣。又胡畎切，音泫。又犬縣切，缺去聲。義?同。

駽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
駽字的起名意思

青黑色的马。亦称“铁青马”。

駽
Basic explanation of words
駽
xuān
Cyan-black horse. Also known as "iron green horse".
駽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuān］
["Guangyun" Fire Xuanqie, Pingxian, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Xu County cuts, go to Hao, Xiao. ]
Also known as "駨2".
Cyan-black horse. Commonly known as Tieqingma.
駽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駽; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1439 24
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Fire Yuanqie [Yunhui] Hu Yuanqie [Zheng Yun] Hu Yuanqie,? Yin Yun. 【Erya·Shiyu】Qianli, 駽. [Note] Today Tie Cong. 【Poetry·Lu Song】Jianbi Chengjun.　[Guangyun] Xuxian cut [Jiyun] Yixian cut [Yunhui] Huxian cut [Zhengyun] Yixian cut,? Yin Xian. Also 【Jiyun】ying silk cut, Yinxian. Hu Dian cut again, Yin Xuan. Dog County cut again, missing the sound. Righteous? Same.
駽
